mapper.select: select id, name, sex, nation,birthday,phone, address,idcar, photo, service from oldman
select id, name, sex, nation,birthday,phone, address,idcar, photo, service from oldman where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
distinct
from oldman
order by id DESC
